pages.text: $(li)The Shattered Wildfire Piece is an item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/outvoted/wildfire_shield_part)Wildfire Shield Part$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfires$(/l) may drop this item on death.
